value.title: Power BI Admins Gain My Workspace Access
value.excerpt: During this video, we will check how Power BI Admins can get User's My Workspace Access. Power BI provides secure storage for user data in their "My Workspaces". value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can stop the interaction between the visualization. Sometimes there is a requirement, where we don’t need the filtering functionality on selected data
